subject: [Radiance-general] Spurious postings...
body:
Dear List,

Apologies to the all for the spate of (mostly outdated) posts.  For some reason, a bunch of posts ended up in the list "jail" and were recently freed by Daniel Fuller, our site administrator.  Check the dates to make sure these haven't been responded to already before you post a reply.

Some of the posts have never appeared before, and could use some attention.

Best,
-Greg
